speaker: Summit Shrine
lines: You step into a ring of stones around a flat of basalt.
A blue granite plinth stands in the center marked with sigils.
Old offerings lie charred near the base.
The wind is thin and steady at the summit.
Worn steps mark a simple ritual path.
Something large shifts in the plinth's shadow.

choices.text: Kneel and swear the old oath to Aegis.
Claim a relic from the heart-stone.
Strike the plinth and defy the old powers.
